root.name: Labyrinth Cross Blood
root.description: OverviewLabyrinth Cross Blood is a scifi take on the first person dungeon crawler RPG made by Experience Inc as part of their Generation XTH series. Originally released for the PC in 2010, it was ported to the Xbox 360 in 2011 as Labyrinth Cross Blood Reloaded, and to the PlayStation Vita in 2013 as Labyrinth Cross Blood Infinity.
